column1: {{book

'''''The 1994 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] ([[Random House]]) on [[12 July]] [[1993]]. It features art by [[Michael Kaluta]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
__NOTOC__
